data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the genus Zimiromus from Argentina (Araneae: Gnaphosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zapata, Lorena V., Grismado, Cristian J. (2012): Description of a new species of the genus Zimiromus from Argentina (Araneae: Gnaphosidae). Zootaxa 3317: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281141
